input: Also, many refined foods, such as white flour, sugar, and white rice, lack B vitamins and other important nutrients unless they are marked "enriched." subclaims_reference: Muchos alimentos refinados carecen de vitaminas del complejo B.

input: The pituitary gland near the brain makes too much of the hormone ACTH (called Cushing's disease), which may happen with too much growth of the pituitary gland, a tumor of the pituitary gland, or a tumor elsewhere in the body (such as the pancreas, lung, and thyroid) that produces ACTH
output:
</think>

La glándula pituitaria, ubicada cerca del cerebro, produce una cantidad excesiva de la hormona ACTH (lo que se conoce como enfermedad de Cushing), lo que puede suceder debido a un crecimiento excesivo de la glándula pitui
subclaims_reference: La hipófisis está cerca del cerebro.
La hipófisis produce hormona corticotropina.
La producción excesiva de hormona corticotropina se llama enfermedad de Cushing.
La enfermedad de Cushing puede ocurrir debido al crecimiento excesivo de la hipófisis.
La enfermedad de Cushing puede ser causada por un tumor en la hipófisis.
La enfermedad de Cushing puede ser causada por un tumor en otra parte del cuerpo.
Los tumores en el páncreas pueden causar la producción excesiva de hormona corticotropina.
Los tumores en el pulmón pueden causar la producción excesiva de hormona corticotropina.
Los tumores en la tiroides pueden causar la producción excesiva de hormona corticotropina.

input: In the past, the prevailing opinion was that it was generally best to assign a gender as quickly as possible, often based on the external genitals rather than the chromosomal gender, and to instruct the parents to have no ambiguity in their minds as to the gender of the child.

subclaims_reference: En el pasado, prevalecía la opinión de asignar un sexo lo más rápido posible.

La asignación de sexo no se basaba en el sexo de los cromosomas.
Se instruía a los padres para evitar ambigüedad sobre el sexo del niño.
La intención era que los padres tuvieran claridad en cuanto al sexo del niño.

input: You have sudden, sharp chest pain with shortness of breath, especially after a long trip, a stretch of bedrest (for example, following an operation), or other lack of movement, especially if one leg is swollen or more swollen than the other (this could be a blood clot, part of which has moved to the lungs).

input: The mother may fake symptoms of illness in her child by adding blood to the child's urine or stool, withholding food, falsifying fevers, secretly giving the child drugs to make the child throw up or have diarrhea, or using other tricks, such as infecting intravenous (given through a vein) lines to make the child appear or become ill.

</think>

input: You can take the tooth to the dentist by following one of these tips:Try to place the tooth back in the mouth where it fell out, so it is level with other teeth. Bite down gently on gauze or a wet tea bag to help keep it in place. Be careful not to swallow the tooth.

subclaims_reference: Intente colocar el diente de nuevo en la boca.

input: Another myth of adolescence is the idea that "it will never happen to me, only the other person." input: It is important to have the teeth cleaned thoroughly.This may involve use of various tools to loosen and remove plaque and tartar from the teeth. Proper flossing and brushing is always needed, even after professional tooth cleaning, to reduce your risk of gum disease. Your dentist or hygienist will show you how to brush and floss properly.
